content: crochet sweater vests are versatile clothing pieces that can be stylish and warm this crochet pattern makes any size ribbed crewneck sweater vest with double-stranded worsted-weight yarn while it s more suitable for intermediate crochets beginners can also tackle this project with the help of the video tutorial 1 this pattern makes a size adult small us sweater vest within the pattern there are italicized notes to let you know when and what to change to adjust the sizing 1 https //youtu be/4kq7lntba9c
